posts.post_content:
An actually good legend from Legends? The equivalent of a 4/4 for 4 (unheard of in those days) and an ability better than Hypnotic Specter's? Not bad at all.  
  
@markarmor: there were a few other decent ones. [Nebuchadnezzar](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nebuchadnezzar), [Jacques le Vert](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jacques le Vert), [Hazezon Tamar](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hazezon Tamar), and [Bartel Runeaxe](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bartel Runeaxe) come to mind.
posts.html:
An actually good legend from Legends? The equivalent of a 4/4 for 4 (unheard of in those days) and an ability better than Hypnotic Specter's? Not bad at all.

@markarmor: there were a few other decent ones. Nebuchadnezzar, Jacques le Vert, Hazezon Tamar, and Bartel Runeaxe come to mind.

Posted By: achilleselbow (7/26/2010 1:43:13 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: The common vanilla "Legends-Legends" always totally sucked and some of rare ones were decent. [Tetsuo Umazawa](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tetsuo Umazawa), [Dakkon Blackblade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dakkon Blackblade), [Angus Mackenzie](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Angus Mackenzie), [Rubinia Soulsinger](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rubinia Soulsinger), [Rasputin Dreamweaver](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rasputin Dreamweaver), [Sol'kanar the Swamp King](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sol'kanar the Swamp King), [Nicol Bolas](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nicol Bolas) and Gwendlyn are all at least somewhat playable, especially with all the mana fixing methods available these days.
posts.html:
The common vanilla "Legends-Legends" always totally sucked and some of rare ones were decent. Tetsuo Umazawa, Dakkon Blackblade, Angus Mackenzie, Rubinia Soulsinger, Rasputin Dreamweaver, Sol'kanar the Swamp King, Nicol Bolas and Gwendlyn are all at least somewhat playable, especially with all the mana fixing methods available these days.

posts.post_content: Whoa. Looking at the card art I had to ask myself, 'Is she doing what I think she's doing?'. Then I read the flavor text and decided yeah, yeah she is. That pudgy fellow doesn't exactly look like a 'swordsman of renown' though. But I just love the idea of a womonster that randomly seduces cards in your opponents hand and slices them when they get too close. I'm also surprised no one has made any 'tap' jokes yet.
posts.html:
Whoa. Looking at the card art I had to ask myself, 'Is she doing what I think she's doing?'. Then I read the flavor text and decided yeah, yeah she is. That pudgy fellow doesn't exactly look like a 'swordsman of renown' though. But I just love the idea of a womonster that randomly seduces cards in your opponents hand and slices them when they get too close. I'm also surprised no one has made any 'tap' jokes yet.
